description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Don't let the name fool you!  "Bad Golf" is a fun, physics-based 2D golf game.  Play a relaxing round by yourself, or a frantic golf race with up to four players!
description.short: Don't let the name fool you!  "Bad Golf" is a fun, physics-based 2D golf game.  Play a relaxing round by yourself, or a frantic golf race with up to four players!
